EmailTemplate.description: No Australian address provided in airport pickup application
EmailTemplate.name: No address
EmailTemplate.subject: Airport pickup request - Australian address required
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.First_Name_case_corrected__c}
Thank you for sending through your airport pickup request.
Unfortunately your booking is incomplete.
URGENT Before I can process the booking request, I need you to confirm by reply email the address where the driver will take you from Melbourne airport.
Please provide the following information:
Business name: Unit number: Street number: Street name: Suburb: Postcode: Contact name: Contact phone number:
As soon as I have this information, I will process your booking and confirm details by email.
Regards
{!User.FirstName} {!User.Lastname_Initial__c} Monash Connect Officer {!User.Department} {!User.CompanyName} Tel: +61 3 9902 6011 CRICOS Provider 00008C
___________________________________ Date Received : {!Case.CreatedDate} Your Enquiry : {!Case.Description}
System Reference. Please do not delete. {!Case.Thread_Id}
The personal information collected by us, or on our behalf, will be used to respond to your inquiry, to inform you about university related events and courses in accordance with the Monash University Privacy Collection Statement. You have the right to access personal information that Monash University holds about you, subject to any exemptions in relevant legislation. Further information about how your personal information is handled at Monash University is available at http://privacy.monash.edu. If you wish to seek access to your personal information, please contact the University Privacy Officer by email at privacyofficer@monash.edu
